name: Idle Weaponshop
description:
In Idle Weaponshop, you are handed your very own weapon shop to manage. Design and sell weapons, build up your local community, hire employees, and send adventurers off into danger for fun and profit... all before prestiging to earn powerful bonuses, all so you can do it all over again.

Features:
  • Design items by choosing blueprints and materials, and then produce and sell those items
  • Unlock additional crafting options, such as enchanting and additional modifications to the item design
  • Unlock additional buildings in your town and craft tools to increase that building's inherent bonus
  • Hire randomly generated employees who provide bonuses to your enterprise. Upgrade them and move them around as you need.
  • Send adventuring parties off to adventure, unlocking relics that provide permanent bonuses.
  • Retire from your store and earn knowledge points, which provide a gold multiplier and can be spent to unlock passives from the sprawling prestige tree.
  • Steam Leaderboards, so you can see how you stack up to all of the other guild members from around the world
